column2: "That Tranmizer is incredible! A shape-shifting Mech! I think I'm in love!"
"...Gah, I gotta stay focused! That thing's crazy powerful! I need to know the best way to take it down!"
"Taking that thing on is a huge risk. It's not only powerful, it's crazy fast to boot. I bet even you couldn't handle it, killer."
"...But I know whatever I say won't stop you. I've come to understand that about ya."
"All I can really do is cheer you on from here, so go give 'em hell. I can't wait to hear your report!"
